com.soa.process.validation

Interface ActivityValidator


  • public interface ActivityValidator
    An interface for performing activity specific validation. The micro-orchestration editor will call any published ActivityValidator implementations when checking the validity of a process. ActivityValidators are optional, not all activities need provide a validator.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String INTERNAL_ACTIVITY_TYPE
      Constant for the internal activity type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.xml.namespace.QName getActivityName()
      Returns the qualified name of the activity the validator validates.
      java.lang.String getActivityType()
      Returns the general type of the activity, see INTERNAL_ACTIVITY_TYPE.
      void validate(ValidationContext context)
      Invokes the validator.

    • Field Detail

      • INTERNAL_ACTIVITY_TYPE

        static final java.lang.String INTERNAL_ACTIVITY_TYPE
        Constant for the internal activity type. An internal activity is an activity executed locally to the micro-orchestration engine, not via a remote invocation.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getActivityName

        javax.xml.namespace.QName getActivityName()
        Returns the qualified name of the activity the validator validates. The qualified name uniquely identifies a specific type of activity, i.e., transformation, audit, etc.
        Returns:
        QName identifying the activity.

      • getActivityType

        java.lang.String getActivityType()
        Returns the general type of the activity, see INTERNAL_ACTIVITY_TYPE.
        Returns:
        General type of the activity.

      • validate

        void validate(ValidationContext context)
        Invokes the validator. The validator will use the context given for both what to validate as well as providing validation feedback.
        Parameters:
        context - Provides information for validation and feedback.
